text: Terence 'Terry' W Glenville (born 1943), is a male former swimmer who competed for England. ==Swimming career== He represented England and won a silver medal in 440 yards medley relay, at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia. he also participated in the 110 yards and 220 yards butterfly events. He was a member of the Hull Swimming Club. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:English male swimmers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in swimming Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England Category:Swimmers at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Terry Glenville
